objects.text:
• Elegant Gold Hardware
• Premium Faux Leather
• Spacious Compartment
• Perfect For Everyday Use

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner features a luxury fashion product presentation with a premium aesthetic. The left half employs a deep, monochromatic quadrant layout using dark greys and black tones, contrasted with diagonal golden accent lines and geometric circles. The top-left contains two prominent text elements: the brand name (`brand_name`) in a bold gold hue and the product name (`heading`) in large white uppercase letters, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) in a soft grey serif font. Product features are listed below (`description`) in white text using bullets, and product pricing (`price`) is shown in large bold gold typography. A call-to-action (`cta`) button with a rounded rectangle (`cta_button`) offers a contrasting gold background and black text. The right half showcases the product image (`product_image`), centrally placed for prominence. Subtle adornments, like dotted and curved golden dividers, reinforce the elegant luxury vibe.

**Color Palette:**
- Black: `#000000`
- Charcoal: `#1A1A1A`, `#0F0F0F`, `#151515`, `#0A0A0A`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Light Grey: `#E0E0E0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a luxurious black leather handbag with elegant gold hardware. The primary color is a deep, matte black (#1C1C1C), providing a sophisticated and timeless base. Gold accents (#D4AF37) — on chains, clasps, and logo details — add a striking contrast, elevating the richness of the design. The subtle texture of the leather enhances depth without overpowering the sleek look. These colors are harmonized delicately: the matte black absorbs light for a refined finish, while the glossy gold reflects light, drawing the viewer's attention to key focal points. Perfect color palette for an advertisement includes: #1C1C1C (black), #D4AF37 (gold), #FFFFFF (white contrast).
